verses.verse: וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> Moreover he made מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> an altar נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H753><s%> the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> thereof and twenty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth וְעֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> thereof and ten אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> the height ס

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Also he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> sea מוּצָ֑ק <S%H3332><s%> a molten עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> of ten בָּֽ֠אַמָּה <S%H520><s%> cubits מִשְּׂפָת֨וֹ <S%H8193><s%> from brim אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׂפָת֜וֹ <S%H8193><s%> to brim עָג֣וֹל ׀ <S%H5696><s%> round סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> in compass וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <S%H6967><s%> the height וְקָו֙ <S%H6957><s%> thereof and a line שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> of thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits יָסֹ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> did compass אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> it round about

וּדְמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> And under it [was] the similitude בְּקָרִים֩ <S%H1241><s%> of oxen תַּ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> under ל֜וֹ סָבִ֤יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> it round about סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about סוֹבְבִ֣ים <S%H5437><s%> which did compass אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עֶ֚שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> in a cubit מַקִּיפִ֥ים <S%H5362><s%> compassing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> it all שְׁנַ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> Two טוּרִים֙ <S%H2905><s%> rows הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> of oxen יְצוּקִ֖ים <S%H3332><s%> [were] cast בְּמֻֽצַקְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4166><s%> when it was cast

עוֹמֵ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> It stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁנֵ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three פֹנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6437><s%> looking צָפ֡וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וּשְׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <S%H7969><s%> and three פֹנִ֨ים ׀ <S%H6437><s%> looking יָ֜מָּה <S%H3220><s%> toward the west וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה ׀ <S%H7969><s%> and three פֹּנִ֣ים <S%H6437><s%> looking נֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> toward the south וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> and three פֹּנִ֣ים <S%H6437><s%> looking מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> toward the east וְהַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> and the sea עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> on מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> [was set] above וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲחֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H268><s%> upon them and all their hinder parts בָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> [were] inward

וְעָבְי֣וֹ <S%H5672><s%> And the thickness טֶ֔פַח <S%H2947><s%> of it [was] an handbreadth וּשְׂפָתוֹ֙ <S%H8193><s%> and the brim כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> of it like the work שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> of the brim כּ֔וֹס <S%H3563><s%> of a cup פֶּ֖רַח <S%H6525><s%> with flowers שֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <S%H7799><s%> of lilies מַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> [and] it received בַּתִּ֔ים <S%H1324><s%> baths שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand יָכִֽיל׃ <S%H3557><s%> and held ס

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> He made כִּיּוֹרִים֮ <S%H3595><s%> lavers עֲשָׂרָה֒ <S%H6235><s%> also ten וַ֠יִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> and put חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> five מִיָּמִ֜ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand וַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> and five מִשְּׂמֹאול֙ <S%H8040><s%> on the left לְרָחְצָ֣ה <S%H7364><s%> to wash בָהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> in them such things as they offered הָעוֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offering יָדִ֣יחוּ <S%H1740><s%> they washed בָ֑ם וְהַיָּ֕ם <S%H3220><s%> in them but the sea לְרָחְצָ֥ה <S%H7364><s%> to wash in לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> [was] for the priests בּֽוֹ׃ ס

וַ֠יַּעַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנֹר֧וֹת <S%H4501><s%> candlesticks הַזָּהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold עֶ֖שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <S%H4941><s%> according to their form וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and set בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> [them] in the temple חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מִיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מִשְּׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> on the left ס

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> He made שֻׁלְחָנוֹת֮ <S%H7979><s%> tables עֲשָׂרָה֒ <S%H6235><s%> also ten וַיַּנַּח֙ <S%H3240><s%> and placed בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> [them] in the temple חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> five מִיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right side וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> and five מִשְּׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> on the left וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made מִזְרְקֵ֥י <S%H4219><s%> basons זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold מֵאָֽה׃ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> Furthermore he made חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> the court הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהָעֲזָרָ֖ה <S%H5835><s%> court הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> and the great וּדְלָת֧וֹת <S%H1817><s%> and doors לָעֲזָרָ֛ה <S%H5835><s%> for the court וְדַלְתוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1817><s%> the doors צִפָּ֥ה <S%H6823><s%> and overlaid נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> of them with brass
